note:
I am now findable at @cmonster@thecanadian.social.
Im living virtually, where I want to live IRL. :)

Living in the NW corner of the US, a long walk from the Canadian border. I do plan to move there someday. #DontPanic I like to explore and discuss. But have avoided social media for a long time, due to the obvious. Respectful disagreement encouraged. Rude, insensitive, cruel, harrassing, and generally evil posts will get you blocked. Boosts DO mean endorsement.
